presentationColumns.name: Product Number
presentationColumns.description: Product Key is an integer that uniquely identifies each record in the Product dimension table.

presentationColumns.name: Product
presentationColumns.description: Returns the product description from the Product dimension. This column is logically sorted by BIEE server according to the Product Sequence column value, and is filtered by BIEE server using the Product Number column value. Naturally drills into Office Column.

presentationColumns.name: Product Type
presentationColumns.description: Returns the Product Type description from the Product dimension. This column is logically filtered by BIEE server using the Product Type Key column value.  Naturally drills into Product Column.

presentationColumns.name: LOB
presentationColumns.description: Returns the Product LOB description from the Product dimension. This column is logically filtered by BIEE server using the Product LOB Key column value. Naturally drills into Product Type Column.

presentationColumns.name: Brand
presentationColumns.description: Returns the Product's brand description from the Product dimension. This column is logically filtered by BIEE server using the Brand Key column value. Naturally drills into LOB Column.
